abstraction_fitness.description: TypeScript abstraction fitness: type and interface layers should improve safety and design clarity, not add ceremony.
look_for: Functions/components that only forward props or args without behavior, validation, or translation
Interfaces/types with one implementation and no polymorphic usage pressure
Large option objects passed through multiple layers with only a small subset used locally
Generic helper abstractions with one concrete type usage in practice
skip: React/Next.js framework composition patterns required by routing or lifecycle boundaries
Wrappers that intentionally add auth, telemetry, caching, feature flags, or retries
Public API typing shells that isolate external SDK volatility

system_prompt_append: TypeScript anchor checks: prop-drilling wrappers, single-implementation interfaces, and generic surfaces used in only one concrete path.
